mapper.select: SELECT a.collection_id, a.student_id, a.exercises_id, a.program_language, b.language_name AS program_language_name, a.git_url, a.data_status, CASE WHEN a.data_status = 'P' THEN '待批改' WHEN a.data_status = 'Y' THEN '正确' WHEN a.data_status = 'N' THEN '错误' ELSE '未知数据状态' END AS data_status_text, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM shangshufang_customer.student_comprehensive_exercises a LEFT JOIN shangshufang_base.programming_language b ON a.program_language = b.language_id WHERE a.student_id = #{studentID, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.exercises_id = #{exercisesID, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shangshufang_customer.student_comprehensive_exercises (student_id, exercises_id, program_language, git_url, data_status, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{studentID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exercisesID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{programLanguage, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gitUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'P', #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
